name: @cycosoft/eyas
description: Feature Branch Testing Without a Server

scripts.dev: npm i && npm-check -u -i '"inquirer"' && npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npx electron .build/index.js --dev --trace-warnings
scripts.dev:mac:cli: npm i && npm-check -u -i '"inquirer"' && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run compile:mac:no-sign && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node dist/cli/index.js
scripts.dev:mac:installer: npm i && npm-check -u -i '"inquirer"' && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run compile:mac:installer:no-sign
scripts.dev:win:cli: npm i && npm-check -u -i '"inquirer"' && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run compile:win:module && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node dist/cli/index.js
scripts.dev:win:installer: npm i && npm-check -u -i '"inquirer"' && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run compile:win:installer
scripts.compile:win32: npm i && cross-env FORCE_BUILD=win32 npm run compile:runner
scripts.compile:mac: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npm run compile:runner && npm run notarize:zip && npm run notarize && npm run notarize:staple && npm run compile:mac:copy && npm run compile:cleanup
scripts.compile:mac:installer: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && cross-env PUBLISH_TYPE=installer npm run compile:runner
scripts.compile:docker: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npm run docker:run && npm run compile:cleanup
scripts.compile:prod: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npm run docker:run && npm run compile:runner && npm run notarize:zip && npm run notarize && npm run notarize:staple && npm run compile:mac:copy && npm run compile:cleanup
scripts.compile:win:module: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npm run compile:runner && npm run compile:cleanup
scripts.compile:win:installer: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && cross-env PUBLISH_TYPE=installer npm run compile:runner
scripts.compile:mac:no-sign: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npm run compile:runner && npm run compile:mac:copy && npm run compile:cleanup
scripts.compile:mac:installer:no-sign: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && cross-env PUBLISH_TYPE=installer npm run compile:runner
scripts.compile:all:no-sign: npm run compile:prep && npm run compile:ui && npm run compile:module && npm run docker:run && npm run compile:runner && npm run compile:mac:copy && npm run compile:cleanup
scripts.sign:win: signtool sign /debug /n "Open Source Developer, Eric Higginson" /t http://time.certum.pl/ /fd sha256 /v ./dist/runners/Start.exe
scripts.docker:run: docker build -t eyas . && docker run -v ./dist/runners:/usr/src/app/dist/runners -it --rm eyas
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump:beta: npm version prerelease --preid beta && git push && git push --tags

author: Cycosoft, LLC (https://cycosoft.com)
